Reviews.Title: Great little TV...
Reviews.Author: M & M
Reviews.Content: Bought this little TV for the kitchen. Clean, simple lines ... and the 19 inch size is perfect for the space. Note that the pictures here are of the 22 inch model ... the inputs are actually on the other side of the TV.Plenty of inputs, set up was easy... (my only gripes are not the fault of the TV .... #%^* Comcast ... why do you insist on scrambling basic cable so I need an ugly digital adapter?) The on screen user interface is pretty and easy to use. Remote Control is your standard multibutton affair!Sound and Picture quality? Great for ths small inexpensive TV. It has a plethora of settings so you can adjust it the way you like. like one reviewer here, I thought it was a little washed out ... but then I found the "Magic Angle" setting and changed it from default to I'm looking at it "Standing" ... i.e. from above (which is how I'm using it - on a kitchen counter) ... and POW ... great color and picture!Couldn't be happier. Excellent TV. Highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: Couldn't be much better
Reviews.Author: jimbinaustin
Reviews.Content: Got this TV about a week ago from Amazon and am amazed by the picture quality. In addition I love the sleek profile which works exceptionally well in my Kitchen. I looked at this side by side with last years Samsung C model lcd which is heavier, a lot bulkier looking and, at least in the store I saw them, did not have as nice of a picture quality.By the way this is listed as "silver" but it's really black with clear plastic on the outside edges of the TV. Calling it silver may mislead some. I was going to blow off buying it because of this but glad I went and checked it out in person. This is one modern looking TV.The only thing that's to be desired is the sound quaility. I'm not going to call it a strike because that's par for the course with this size unit. There are limitiations to every product. It would probably cost a fortune to put full sounding speakers in such a small profile.Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Awesome LED TV
Reviews.Author: Kevin
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my college dorm room and so far I am very happy with this purchase. It delivers a crystal clear picture and amazing sound. I plugged in my Xbox 360 and it plays it on high resolution and it looks incredible. A very good investment for a kitchen or a small room or a college dorm room.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture once you learn the trick
Reviews.Author: Jeanne
Reviews.Content: My 19" Samsung sits on a counter-level peninsula in my kitchen.  Initially, I was very disappointed in the color which was very washed out.  I hesitated to start playing around with the color controls fearing I would make it worse.  I decided to check out the Reviews and discovered the solution in an earlier review.  Namely, to go into the "Samsung MagicAngle" option within the "Picture Mode" in the Menu and change the angle to "Standing Mode."  That worked like a charm.  Also, I agree with earlier reviewers about the sound.  I typically have to turn the sound up nearly as high as it will go to hear it 8' away. Nevertheless, I really like the TV and am glad I got it.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN19D4000 19" LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: ysutton
Reviews.Content: This 19" television was purchased for the kitchen and I am very pleased with the picture quality and sound. Such a great price for what you get that I am thinking of getting a couple more for other rooms in the house. Excellent small TV!

Reviews.Title: Superior TV!
Reviews.Author: Colonel A
Reviews.Content: After conducting extensive research, I decided on this unit.  The picture quality is extremely sharp and the overall design is excellent.  Can't imagine a better unit for the price.

Reviews.Title: Excellent pictures
Reviews.Author: Tolights - celebrity cruises
Reviews.Content: I've been using this Samsung for about 2 weeks now and its picture quality is excellent. You can use different type of sound whether you are watching movies or just listening to music.

Reviews.Title: Perfect tv for small places
Reviews.Author: Tedwinko
Reviews.Content: I was shopping for a 15" tv as that is the size I had before. Now  very little available and of poor quality in 15".  This19" tv fits the space perfectly and oddly even looks smaller than the old one because of the way the measurements of the screen are configured.  As long as you measure your space and it fits these specs you will not be sorry.  Excellent color too.

Reviews.Title: kitchen tv
Reviews.Author: Lynn Murphy
Reviews.Content: it fit great in my space below my cabinets. can't quite get the colores right but i think it's my lack of knowledge. base is not tight enough and i don't know why. wonder if anyone else found this to be true? other than that, it's agood looking tv and gives me much more counter space.

Reviews.Title: weak picture
Reviews.Author: Buster
Reviews.Content: The picture appeared "washed out". I was unable to improve the picture using all the adjustments on the tv. Very disappointed in this Samsung. I have a 5 year old 32 inch Samsung which is great-hence thought this one would be too. I returned it and Amazon quickly refunded my money without any problems. Will buy from Amazon again.

Reviews.Title: daughters christmas present
Reviews.Author: Heidi
Reviews.Content: Great little tv for my daughters room. Only complaint is that it was stuck in "store demo" mode and took me 2 hours to figure out through internet searches on how to turn it off. Lets hope that never gets turned on again lol. Most importantly there are two hdmi plugs on this tv so we could plug in the cable box and a blu ray player. Sound and picture quality is excellent for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture
Reviews.Author: R. Irvine
Reviews.Content: I looked around at just about every TV in this category and could not be happier with my decision. The TV has ample ports for setting up connections to external home theater speakers, Apple TV, etc. Picture is crisp and colors beautifully balanced. Programming is relatively simple.

Reviews.Title: Size does matter!
Reviews.Author: M. Beck "la milagrosa"
Reviews.Content: Because I had an existing Pivotelli wall bracket that would only accommodate certain dimensions I had to adhere to said restrictions.  After comparisons of available models and brands I chose Samsung.  I am so pleased that I did.  Excellent quality and the "best bang for your buck "!

Reviews.Title: Works great.
Reviews.Author: Daniel F. Neumann
Reviews.Content: Product is very thin, just as described.Great picture.Sound a bit thin, like the case.Easy to install and very light.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN19D4000
Reviews.Author: rkd
Reviews.Content: Used as wall-mounted kitchen TV hooked to cable. Clean, thin design. Good picture. Good sound.Easy on screen program to find, scan, and set channels. Full function remote.

Reviews.Title: Product Pictured is inaccurate - Beware if mounting on a wall!
Reviews.Author: Mark Eckersdorff
Reviews.Content: Be aware: If you plan on mounting this TV on a wall, the picture on Amazon's website is inaccurate.  The picture is of the 22" model, which shows the mounting screw holes centered on the back of the TV.  The 19" model, probably because of the smaller chassis, has the screw holes at the very TOP of the back of the TV.  So, when I hung it on the wall mount, about 1/3 of the mounting plate sits above the back of the TV, making it look vaguely like it has bunny ears.  Pretty ridiculous in my opinion.  Customers should be aware of this.  Otherwise it's a good TV, a little pricey for the size, in my opinion.  I got the 40 inch version 1080p SmartTV for under 600 dollars at Sears, so it seems like this is a little expensive, but it's in line with the prices elsewhere.

Reviews.Title: Smells like a chemical factory.
Reviews.Author: goodstuff "no crap!"
Reviews.Content: I had to return this unit. The chemical smell coming off the thing was dizzy-making. Stuck it in a spare room for a few days. Smell still strong.  The packaging was permeated with the smell too.Too bad because Samsung pictures are very good. In the past, I've bought Samsungs where the package said "eco friendly -- low VCO". Unfortunately, not the case here.

Reviews.Title: Terrible picture and even worse sound quality
Reviews.Author: gregorym
Reviews.Content: I chose this model because it was a Samsung, it was stylish and it fit perfectly into the tight space I needed it for. However, had I not scratched the frame during installation I would have returned it immediately. The image is soft, the color off and if you are not sitting immediately in front of it completely washed out. The sound is thin, tinny and grating. I am thinking of throwing it out and just purchasing another. Hugely disappointed.

ProductInfo.Features:
720p resolution
Ultra Slim Touch of Color Design
ENERGY STAR compliant
ConnectShare Movie
Wide Color Enhancer Plus
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung UN19D4000 19-Inch 720p 60Hz LED HDTV (Black) [2011 MODEL]
